title: Advancing H&E-to-IHC Stain Translation in Breast Cancer: A Multi-Magnification and Attention-Based Approach
details: L Qu, C Zhang, G Li, H Zheng, C Peng, W He - arXiv preprint arXiv:2408.01929, 2024
abstract: Breast cancer presents a significant healthcare challenge globally, demanding precise diagnostics and effective treatment strategies, where histopathological examination of Hematoxylin and Eosin (H&E) stained tissue sections plays a central …
